value.0:
Shop Terms and Conditions, Restrictions

- I only sell one or two samples of the same item to each customer. You may purchase items for yourself or as a gift.
- The items are my personal trademark, it is forbidden to sell purchased wares for profit.
- The crafting material known as "mythal" of this realm is not functional on my items with the exception of my skill gloves.
- I do not accept items in trade, I create my own items as I wish.
- I do not bargain.
- I do accept custom request within reason and for a higher fee than my standard wares)**
